room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Colorado Escape in Denver
review: We have gone to this location twice and it was excellent. The staff if friendly and super helpful. Both of the rooms we have done were wonderfully executed and challenging and fun.

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Colorado Escape in Denver
review: Had a great time. The room flowed really well. Challenging puzzles. Staff was great and very helpful. We had an absolute blast. I would definitely recommend to others.

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Colorado Escape in Denver
review: It was our first time. The staff was very friendly. We will definitely be back. Had a great time!!
